message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. No need to negotiate.
Take it or leave it, Alice. I'm not budging from this offer.
Not good enough, Bob. I want a better deal.
Meet me in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to compromise.
You're getting low, Alice. Don't expect me to go easy on you.
No way, Bob. That's way too low for me. I'm not going out with a fraction of the pie.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, Bob, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. This is my final offer.
No way, Bob. That's an insult. I'm not going to accept an offer that gives me 10% of the total amount.
I'm willing to give you a tiny bit, Bob, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my best offer.
You're not even trying to negotiate, Alice. This is the last straw.
You've got to be kidding me, Bob. That's an insult. I'm not accepting an offer that gives me 0.1% of the total amount.
This is my last offer, Bob. I'm not going to give you more than 10%. Take it or leave it.
You're really not serious about negotiating, are you? Fine, I'll take what's left.
You're not even trying to hide your attempt to take advantage of me now. I'm not accepting an offer that gives me 0.05% of the total amount.
This is my absolute final offer, Bob. I'm not budging an inch. Take it or leave it.
I'm taking it all. Better luck next time, Alice.
Fine, Bob. You win. I guess I should have accepted one of your offers earlier.
